Default is one hour."},"livy.server.csrf_protection.enabled":{"value":"false","description":"Whether to enable csrf protection for livy's rest api."}},"customKeys":{}}},{"properties":{"serviceName":"spark-service","componentName":"livy-config","fileName":"livy-client.conf","type":"key-value","defaultKeys":{"livy.client.http.connection.timeout":{"value":"10s","description":"livy.client.http.connection.timeout"}},"customKeys":{}}},{"properties":{"serviceName":"spark-service","componentName":"livy-config","fileName":"log4j2.properties","content":"status = INFO
name = PropertiesConfig
appenders = console
appender.console.type = Console
appender.console.name = STDOUT
appender.console.layout.type = PatternLayout
appender.console.layout.pattern = %d %p %c{1} [%t]: %m | Metadata: %replace{%replace{%replace{%X}{([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)}{"$1"}}{\=}{\:}}{\\{\\}}{None Available} %n%ex
rootLogger.level = INFO
rootLogger.appenderRef.console.ref = STDOUT
","type":"content"}},{"properties":{"serviceName":"spark-service","componentName":"livy-config","fileName":"spark-blacklist.conf","content":"#
# Configuration override / blacklist. Defines a list of properties that users are not allowed
# to override when starting Spark sessions.
#
# This file takes a list of property names (one per line). Empty lines and lines starting with "#"
# are ignored.
#

# Disallow overriding the master and the deploy mode.
spark.master
spark.submit.deployMode

# Disallow overriding the location of Spark cached jars.
spark.yarn.jar
spark.yarn.jars
spark.yarn.archive

# Don't allow users to override the RSC timeout.
livy.rsc.server.idle_timeout
","type":"content"}},{"properties":{"serviceName":"spark-service","componentName":"livy-config","fileName":"livy-env.sh","content":"# Wrongly configured would results in livy startup failures.
export LIVY_LOG_DIR=/usr/livy/logs
# Changing LIVY_SERVER_JAVA_OPTS make sure to update livy.memory-mb in livy.conf too

export ZEPPELIN_JAVA_OPTS="-Dhdp.version=5.1.3.7"
export ZEPPELIN_HOME=/usr/zeppelin/current
export ZEPPELIN_CONF_DIR=/usr/zeppelin/conf
export ZEPPELIN_LOG_DIR=/usr/zeppelin/logs
export ZEPPELIN_PID_DIR=/usr/zeppelin/run
export ZEPPELIN_SERVER_CONTEXT_PATH=/p/zeppelin

export PYTHONPATH="${SPARK_HOME}/python:${SPARK_HOME}/python/lib/py4j-0.10.9-src.zip"
export SPARK_YARN_USER_ENV="PYTHONPATH=${PYTHONPATH}"

With spark.dynamicAllocation.enabled, the initial set of executors will be at least this large."},"spark.executor.memory":{"value":"12288m","description":"Amount of memory to use per executor process, in MiB unless otherwise specified."},"spark.executor.memoryOverhead":{"value":"384","description":"The amount of off-heap memory to be allocated per executor in cluster mode, in MiB unless otherwise specified."},"spark.rdd.compress":{"value":"true","description":"Whether to compress serialized RDD partitions (e.g. for StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER in Java and Scala or StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY in Python). Can save substantial space at the cost of some extra CPU time. Compression will use spark.io.compression.codec"},"spark.serializer":{"value":"org.apache.spark.serializer.KryoSerializer","description":"Class to use for serializing objects that will be sent over the network or need to be cached in serialized form. Used by metastore client to connect to remote metastore."}},"customKeys":{}}},{"properties":{"serviceName":"spark-service","componentName":"spark-config","fileName":"log4j2.properties","content":"status=INFO
name=SparkLog4j2

property.sparkapp.log.level=INFO
property.sparkapp.log.dir=/var/log/sparkapp

appenders=console,SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER,SparkJobEventsAPPENDER,SparkStageEventsAPPENDER,SparkTaskEventsAPPENDER,SparkBlockManagerEventsAPPENDER,SparkExecutorEventsAPPENDER,SparkEnvironmentEventsAPPENDER,SparkExtraEventsAPPENDER
appender.console.type=Console
appender.console.name=console
appender.console.target=SYSTEM_ERR
appender.console.layout.type=PatternLayout
appender.console.layout.pattern=%d{yy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss} %p %c{1} [%t]: %m%n
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.type=RollingFile
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.name=SparkApplicationEventsAppender
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.fileName=${sys:sparkapp.log.dir}/sparkapplicationevents.log
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.filePattern=${sys:sparkapp.log.dir}/sparkapplicationevents-%i.log
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.layout.type=PatternLayout
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.layout.pattern=%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] %c{2}: %m%n
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.policies.type=Policies
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.policies.size.type=SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.policies.size.size=100MB
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.strategy.type=DefaultRolloverStrategy
appender.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.strategy.max=5

appender.SparkJobEventsAPPENDER.type=RollingFile
appender.SparkJobEventsAPPENDER.name=SparkJobEventsAPPENDER
appender.SparkJobEventsAPPENDER.fileName=${sys:sparkapp.log.dir}/sparkjobevents.log

appender.SparkJobEventsAPPENDER.layout.type=PatternLayout

appender.SparkJobEventsAPPENDER.policies.type=Policies
appender.SparkJobEventsAPPENDER.policies.size.type=SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy

appender.SparkStageEventsAPPENDER.type=RollingFile

appender.SparkExtraEventsAPPENDER.layout.type=PatternLayout
appender.SparkExtraEventsAPPENDER.layout.pattern=%d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] %c{2}: %m%n
appender.SparkExtraEventsAPPENDER.policies.type=Policies
appender.SparkExtraEventsAPPENDER.policies.size.type=SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy
appender.SparkExtraEventsAPPENDER.policies.size.size=100MB
appender.SparkExtraEventsAPPENDER.strategy.type=DefaultRolloverStrategy
appender.SparkExtraEventsAPPENDER.strategy.max=5

# Loggers
loggers=sparkapplicationevents,sparkjobevents,sparkstageevents,sparktaskevents,sparkblockmanagerevents,sparkexecutorevents,sparkenvironmentevents,sparkextraevents
logger.sparkapplicationevents.name=SparkApplicationEvents
logger.sparkapplicationevents.level=INFO
logger.sparkapplicationevents.additivity=false
logger.sparkapplicationevents.appenderRefs=SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER
logger.sparkapplicationevents.appenderRef.SparkApplicationEventsAPPENDER.ref=SparkApplicationEventsAppender

logger.sparkjobevents.name=SparkJobEvents
logger.sparkjobevents.level=INFO
logger.sparkjobevents.additivity=false
logger.sparkjobevents.appenderRefs=SparkJobEventsAPPENDER
logger.sparkjobevents.appenderRef.SparkJobEventsAPPENDER.ref=SparkJobEventsAPPENDER

logger.sparkstageevents.name=SparkStageEvents
logger.sparkstageevents.level=INFO
logger.sparkstageevents.additivity=false
logger.sparkstageevents.appenderRefs=SparkStageEventsAPPENDER
logger.sparkstageevents.appenderRef.SparkStageEventsAPPENDER.ref=SparkStageEventsAppender

logger.sparktaskevents.name=SparkTaskEvents
logger.sparktaskevents.level=INFO
logger.sparktaskevents.additivity=false
logger.sparktaskevents.appenderRefs=SparkTaskEventsAPPENDER
logger.sparktaskevents.appenderRef.SparkTaskEventsAPPENDER.ref=SparkTaskEventsAppender

logger.sparkblockmanagerevents.name=SparkBlockManagerEvents
logger.sparkblockmanagerevents.level=INFO
logger.sparkblockmanagerevents.additivity=false
logger.sparkblockmanagerevents.appenderRefs=SparkBlockManagerEventsAPPENDER
logger.sparkblockmanagerevents.appenderRef.SparkBlockManagerEventsAPPENDER.ref=SparkBlockManagerEventsAPPENDER

logger.sparkexecutorevents.name=SparkExecutorEvents
logger.sparkexecutorevents.level=INFO
logger.sparkexecutorevents.additivity=false
logger.sparkexecutorevents.appenderRefs=SparkExecutorEventsAPPENDER
logger.sparkexecutorevents.appenderRef.SparkExecutorEventsAPPENDER.ref=SparkExecutorEventsAPPENDER

logger.sparkenvironmentevents.name=SparkEnvironmentEvents
logger.sparkenvironmentevents.level=INFO
logger.sparkenvironmentevents.additivity=false
logger.sparkenvironmentevents.appenderRefs=SparkEnvironmentEventsAPPENDER
logger.sparkenvironmentevents.appenderRef.SparkEnvironmentEventsAPPENDER.ref=SparkEnvironmentEventsAppender

logger.sparkextraevents.name=SparkExtraEvents
logger.sparkextraevents.level=INFO
logger.sparkextraevents.additivity=false
logger.sparkextraevents.appenderRefs=SparkExtraEventsAPPENDER
logger.sparkextraevents.appenderRef.SparkExtraEventsAPPENDER.ref=SparkExtraEventsAppender

rootLogger.level=${sys:sparkapp.log.level}
rootLogger.appenderRefs=stdout
rootLogger.appenderRef.stdout.ref=console
